Total War: Warhammer Race Picker

Hello, welcome to total war Warhammer race picker. If you're anything like me after spending a few hundred hours playing, it gets strenuous to choose what race to be, so I've created this website to help. Just select your campaign, mark off the add-ons you haven't got, hit the get race button, and start conquering.
